channel.title: admin on Franz Krah
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Franz Krah

item.description: I received a PhD in fungal community ecology from the Technical University of Munich (summa cum laude). I am interested in understanding how resources (e.g., dead wood) and environment (e.g., climate) influence fungal communities. My research applies experiment-based and trait/evolution-based approaches to study fungal adaptations to their environment and substrates.
